title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents and Tumblr has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 83.0 is found at Platform Facebook and the minimum is found at Tumblr where Platform is 2.0.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Platform Snapchat.
Platform Facebook has 41.5 times more Share of respondents than Platform Tumblr which is has the lowest.
Platform Facebook is higher than any other Platforms with value 83.0, followed by Snapchat, and YouTube. Down to Platform Tumblr with the lowest value 2.0.
Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp have a similar Share of respondents that is 16.0.
The highest value 83.0 at Facebook is almost 2.43 times larger than the average value 34.2.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 342.0.
